How can I change the language for Steam and my games?

[h4]Changing the language of the Steam client[/h4]The Steam language setting determines which language the Steam client application displays, as well as the language which games are presented in. (Third-party titles may have their own language settings - these settings will generally be independent of the Steam language setting)

[olist]  	[*]Log into your Steam account[/*]  	[*]Click on "[b]Steam" [/b]in the top menu bar (this is in the very upper left of Steam on Windows, or in the menu bar above Steam on OSX)[/*]  	[*]Go to the [b]Settings[/b] option ("Preferences on" OSX)[/*]  	[*]Go to the [b]Interface[/b] tab[/*]  	[*]Select the language you wish to use from the drop-down menu[/*]  	[*]Click [b]OK[/b] and then select the option to [b]Restart Steam[/b][/*]  	[*]Once Steam restarts, you will be able to use Steam and Valve games in the language which you selected.[/*]  	[*]If you have games installed that support the language you have selected, files for that language may need to be downloaded before you can play. [/*]  [/olist]

[h4]Changing the language of individual games[/h4]The language of many games can be changed independently from the Steam client language.

[olist]  	[*]Open your Steam Library[/*]  	[*]Right click the game title and select [b]Properties...[/b].[/*]  	[*]Go to the [b]Language[/b] tab[/*]  	[*]Select the language you wish to use from the drop-down menu[/*]  	[*]If the game supports the language you have selected, files for that language may need to be downloaded before you can play.[/*]  [/olist]
If you are experiencing problems enabling a language, make sure your desired language is selected in both locations.

[section style=note]Some languages may not be available for the game you wish to play. Check the Steam store page for the game to see which languages are offered.[/section]
title: Steam and Games - Language Settings
